metadata.synopsis: Camp relationship dialog for Halsin after reaching Act 3. He may proposition you romantically, or remain platonic.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Camp night after hitting Act 3 and having had at least 2 flirt moments with Halsin. Ignores if you are in an existing relationship.

28.speaker: Halsin
28.text: I never quite realised how burdened I was, until I met you. The threat of the shadow curse, the politics of the grove...

48.speaker: Halsin
48.text: ...I was forgetting who I was, but you lifted the fog. Thank you.

24.speaker: Halsin
24.text: You're too modest. I wager you don't even know how extraordinary you truly are. But I do.
24.context: NodeContext: Intense, smouldering, full of longing.

104.speaker: Halsin
104.text: I have lived a very long time. I have taken many lovers. My heart does not stir lightly. But it does now.
104.context: NodeContext: Intense, smouldering, full of longing.

1.speaker: Halsin
1.text: I want more than to fight at your side, or sit around the campfire with you. I want to lay with you under the stars and feel your skin against mine.

60.speaker: Halsin
60.text: I think you feel the same way - why else would you have been so concerned about whether I had a lover before?
60.context: InternalNodeContext: This node if the player engaged in some flirtation/enquiries about Halsin's love life in his default dialogue

92.speaker: Halsin
92.text: I think you feel the same way - you saw to my needs here in camp with the care of a lover, not a host.

82.speaker: Halsin
82.text: I think you feel the same way - you saw to my needs here in camp with the care of a lover, not a host.

80.speaker: Halsin
80.text: I think you feel the same way - you saw to my needs here in camp with the care of a lover, not a host.

93.speaker: Halsin
93.text: I think you feel the same way. Once the power of the shadow curse was broken, the connection was undeniable. We both felt it.
93.context: InternalNodeContext: This node if the player engaged in some flirtation with Halsin after the curse was lifted (can occur in either SCE_Halsin or CAMP_Halsin)

12.speaker: Halsin
12.text: I think you feel the same way. Do you remember the celebrations after you saved the grove? There was a connection.

2.speaker: Halsin
2.text: But tell me I'm wrong, and the matter can rest. I do not wish to sour our friendship, but I have to know if it can be something more.

49.speaker: Player
49.text: I'd be lying if I said I wasn't interested - but I'm already in a relationship.

19.speaker: Halsin
19.text: You have bonded with Wyll, body and soul. His scent lingers on your skin. If there is to be anything between us, it must be with his consent. And perhaps some day, his participation.

83.speaker: Halsin
83.text: You have bonded with Shadowheart, body and soul. Her scent lingers on your skin. If there is to be anything between us, it must be with her consent. And perhaps some day, her participation.

65.speaker: Halsin
65.text: You have bonded with Gale, body and soul. His scent lingers on your skin. If there is to be anything between us, it must be with his consent. And perhaps some day, his participation.

34.speaker: Halsin
34.text: You have bonded with Lae'zel, body and soul. Her scent lingers on your skin. If there is to be anything between us, it must be with her consent. And perhaps some day, her participation.

119.speaker: Halsin
119.text: You have bonded with Astarion, body and soul. His scent lingers on your skin. If there is to be anything between us, it must be with his consent. And perhaps some day, his participation.

4.speaker: Halsin
4.text: You have bonded with Karlach, body and soul. Her scent lingers on your skin. If there is to be anything between us, it must be with her consent. And perhaps some day, her participation.

89.speaker: Halsin
89.text: I understand. If that is where the matter ends, so be it.

88.speaker: Halsin
88.text: But know that if you are open to it, I will not demand commitment of you. Your heart is your own - I just want to share in it.

73.speaker: Player
73.text: You just want to share? What do you mean?

55.speaker: Halsin
55.text: Some treat their relationships like a walled garden - tidy, tamed, cut off from the world. That is their right, but it is not for me. I do as nature does, and let my heart run wild. Desire flourishes wherever it finds purchase.
55.context: NodeContext: Sincere. This is a core belief of his.

72.speaker: Halsin
72.text: It has its place, but it is not for me. The wolf mates for life, but the bear roams free and partners as its instinct dictates.
72.context: NodeContext: Sincere. This is a core belief of his.

110.speaker: Halsin
110.text: I need to stay true to my nature, and you to yours. Perhaps you are like me, or perhaps not.
110.context: NodeContext: 'This is who I am. I really hope you're into that'.

42.speaker: Player
42.text: I want you. Consider things ended between Wyll and I.

30.speaker: Halsin
30.text: Are you sure you wish to end the affair so... coldly? Perhaps if you speak to him, he may show an open mind.

45.speaker: Player
45.text: No. I've made up my mind. Do you still want this?

37.speaker: Halsin
37.text: I... I do. I want this. I want you.

115.speaker: Halsin
115.text: Now? Now you must rest. For the moment that engine of yours is fixed, I doubt you'll be getting very much sleep at all.

27.speaker: Halsin
27.text: When the others are sleeping, we'll slip away together. And we won't get much sleep.

50.speaker: Player
50.text: I will speak with my current lover.

9.speaker: Halsin
9.text: Take your time. I'll be waiting.

123.speaker: Player
123.text: I want you. Consider things ended between Shadowheart and I.

113.speaker: Halsin
113.text: Are you sure you wish to end the affair so... coldly? Perhaps if you speak to her, she may show an open mind.

11.speaker: Player
11.text: I want you. Consider things ended between Gale and I.

97.speaker: Halsin
97.text: Are you sure you wish to end the affair so... coldly? Perhaps if you speak to him, he may show an open mind.

122.speaker: Player
122.text: I want you. Consider things ended between Lae'zel and I.

120.speaker: Halsin
120.text: Are you sure you wish to end the affair so... coldly? Perhaps if you speak to her, she may show an open mind.

96.speaker: Player
96.text: I want you. Consider things ended between Astarion and I.

41.speaker: Halsin
41.text: Are you sure you wish to end the affair so... coldly? Perhaps if you speak to him, he may show an open mind.

100.speaker: Player
100.text: I want you. Consider things ended between Karlach and I.

29.speaker: Halsin
29.text: Are you sure you wish to end the affair so... coldly? Perhaps if you speak to her, she may show an open mind.

23.speaker: Player
23.text: I want you. Consider my other relationship a thing of the past.

31.speaker: Halsin
31.text: Are you sure you wish to end the affair so... coldly? Perhaps if you asked, you may find your lover has an open mind.

111.speaker: Player
111.text: I'm sorry - I'm in a relationship. I don't want to jeopardise it.

116.speaker: Halsin
116.text: I understand, and I still cherish our relationship.

109.speaker: Halsin
109.text: Still... I could not have forgiven myself had I not taken the plunge. Better to have tried and failed.
109.context: NodeContext: A little wistful. He's glad he took his shot, but would have preferred a different outcome.

74.speaker: Player
74.text: You're not wrong. Far from it.

69.speaker: Halsin
69.text: I was concerned perhaps my imagination was playing tricks on me - my stomach was in knots like some lovelorn ninety-year-old.
69.context: CinematicNodeContext: Relieved smile.NodeContext: Relieved smile

67.speaker: Halsin
67.text: If we do this, I need you to understand exactly what I do not ask of you:

52.speaker: Halsin
52.text: I will not ask you to dedicate yourself to me. I roam as nature wills me to, and your heart remains your own. I just wish to share in it.

79.speaker: Player
79.text: You can share in my heart. And a lot more besides.

70.speaker: Halsin
70.text: The feeling is more than mutual. Now: you must rest. And in the morning, we must get that engine of yours fixed. The moment I am able to touch you will be... memorable. For us both, I hope.

108.speaker: Player
108.text: I don't think we share the same nature. This isn't to be, I'm sorry.

98.speaker: Player
98.text: I'm sorry, I've changed my mind. We shouldn't do this.

17.speaker: Player
17.text: I'm afraid I just don't see you that way.

59.speaker: Player
59.text: If I wanted to rut with half a tonne of dumb muscle, I'd seduce a deep rothé.

25.speaker: Halsin
25.text: A simple 'no' would have sufficed. I will trouble you with the matter no more.
25.context: CinematicNodeContext: Halsin looks crestfallenNodeContext: Wounded. His romantic overture has been brutally shot down

54.speaker: Halsin
54.text: I think you feel the same way. The connection is... palpable.

13.speaker: Player
13.text: Many lovers? Perhaps your heart stirs more easily than you think.

44.speaker: Halsin
44.text: Like I said, I've lived a long time, travelled far and wide. I've lain with elf maidens under the boughs of oaks. I've had a Nelanther pirate claw my back and cry my name until he was hoarse.
44.context: NodeContext: Without shame. He's lived a long time and has amassed more than a few notches on the bedpost

57.speaker: Halsin
57.text: And I've been to the Underdark. Many times.
57.context: CinematicNodeContext: Big grin on 'many times'. Thinking fondly of past trysts.NodeContext: Big grin on 'many times'. Thinking fondly of past trysts.

117.speaker: Player
117.text: I thought you were bound to nature.

14.speaker: Halsin
14.text: I still have hot blood in my veins. Nature gifted us our desires, and the means to act on them. But we muddied its beautiful simplicity with rules, social strictures... clothes.
14.context: CinematicNodeContext: Glances down at his own clothing with playful disdain on 'clothes'NodeContext: Playful disdain on 'clothes'

103.speaker: Halsin
103.text: So, I am not bound to nature. I am unbound in nature.

26.speaker: Halsin
26.text: Truly? I was sure we had a connection - you seemed more than a little curious about my current love life, for one.
26.context: InternalNodeContext: This node if the player flirted with Halsin in Halsin_InParty

106.speaker: Halsin
106.text: Truly? I thought you felt the same as I did - you saw to my needs here in camp with the care of a lover, not a host.
106.context: InternalNodeContext: This node if the player flirted with Halsin in SCE_Halsin or CAMP_Halsin2 (before completing Lifting the Curse)

47.speaker: Halsin
47.text: Truly? I thought you felt the same as I did - you saw to my needs here in camp with the care of a lover, not a host.
47.context: InternalNodeContext: This node if the player flirted with Halsin in SCE_Halsin or CAMP_Halsin2 (before completing Lifting the Curse)

64.speaker: Halsin
64.text: Truly? I thought you felt the same as I did - you saw to my needs here in camp with the care of a lover, not a host.
64.context: InternalNodeContext: This node if the player flirted with Halsin in SCE_Halsin or CAMP_Halsin2 (before completing Lifting the Curse)

35.speaker: Halsin
35.text: Truly? I was sure you felt the same way. Once the power of the shadow curse was broken, the connection was undeniable.
35.context: InternalNodeContext: This node if the player flirted with Halsin in SCE_Halsin or CAMP_Halsin2 (after completing Lifting the Curse)

15.speaker: Halsin
15.text: Truly? I was sure there was a connection, ever since we celebrated after you saved the grove.
15.context: InternalNodeContext: This node if the player flirted with Halsin during CAMP_GoblinHuntCelebration_Halsin

101.speaker: Halsin
101.text: But I respect your choice, if that's how you truly feel. Your friendship remains precious to me.

58.speaker: Halsin
58.text: Truly? I thought you felt the same way as me. There was a connection, I was sure.

20.speaker: Player
20.text: I had my reasons for helping. You're a useful ally.

78.speaker: Halsin
78.text: I want to be more than that to you. I have lived a very long time. I have taken many lovers. My heart does not stir lightly. But it does now.
78.context: NodeContext: Intense, smouldering, full of longing.

85.speaker: Player
85.text: So the fog's lifted - what have you discovered?

107.speaker: Halsin
107.text: You. I discovered you. I have lived a very long time. I have taken many lovers. My heart does not stir lightly. But it does now.
107.context: NodeContext: Intense, smouldering, full of longing.

39.speaker: Halsin
39.context: NodeContext: Intense, smouldering, full of longing.

66.speaker: Halsin
66.text: It allowed me to see you. Truly see you. I have lived a very long time. I have taken many lovers. My heart does not stir lightly. But it does now.
66.context: NodeContext: Intense, smouldering, full of longing.

61.speaker: Halsin
61.text: I already knew I had found a strong ally in you - but now I see I have been blessed with a true friend also.

40.speaker: Player
40.text: I'm glad, Halsin. I feel the same way.

33.speaker: Halsin
33.text: I thought you might, but it still warms my heart to hear you say it.

18.speaker: Player
18.text: Honestly, I just needed someone strong enough to carry around all my gear.

6.speaker: Halsin
6.text: Ha! I am honoured to be your beast of burden, then.

68.speaker: Halsin
68.text: I did not wish for another day to end without telling you how I felt, and now I have done so. Rest well, and thank you once again.

86.speaker: Halsin
86.text: I see... well, perhaps not all friendships are destined to be balanced and reciprocal. But I remain eternally grateful for having met you, all the same. Rest well.

5.speaker: Player
5.text: Did I have a choice? You basically invited yourself along.

62.speaker: Halsin
62.text: Ha! I suppose I did, didn't I? I was so focused on helping Thaniel that my sense of decorum was neglected.

76.speaker: Halsin
76.text: I shall endeavour to be more tactful when trying to make friends in future.

46.speaker: Halsin
46.text: I believe so. Perhaps in another life, we would have felt something more stir between us... but that was not meant to be.

84.speaker: Halsin
84.text: The bond we share remains deeply precious to me, all the same.
